CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(Terminal_Stage__c), NOT(isGoal__c) ), MAX( IF( NOT(ISBLANK(BreachTime__c)), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Field_Value_Ending_Timestamp__c)), Field_Value_Ending_Timestamp__c - BreachTime__c, NOW()-BreachTime__c ), null ), 0 ), null )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Time since breach in days. Stops when the next Step is reached
CustomField.label: (Deprecated) Time Since Breach (in days)
